name: Fetch Mirror Document
summary: Learn about .FETCHMIRROR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Mirror feature enables you to automatically copy any new or changed files from a local folder to a remote folder on a server as well as from the server folder to the local folder. The FETCHMIRROR document allows you to save settings from the Mirror feature so you can easily use them again at a later time.

description: Mirror download document created by Fetch, an FTP client for OS X; stores settings from a Mirror window such as local and remote paths, hosts, and users; also includes whether to delete stray items at destination.
